awd_titl_txt: Magma Chamber Recharge in the Palisades Sill
awd_abstract_narration: This project will examine in detail the compositional,                          mineralogical, and textural changes that occur at these horizons                in the intrusion where a new pulse of magma has been injected.                  It is hoped that the data collected will provide new insights                   into the nature and extent of the magma mixing that occurs when a               new pulse of primative magma is injected into a chamber that                    contains a pre-existing more-evolved magma.  The date may also                  help to establish some minimum values for the thicknesses of                    crystal-liquid mush zones along the crystallization front in                    magma chambers, and/or provide some minimum distances for                       interstitial-melt migration in rapidly cooled plutonic rocks

inst.org_lgl_bus_name: THE RESEARCH FOUNDATION FOR THE STATE UNIVERSITY OF NEW YORK
